title: I am not receiving Level Up Capsules
body: I have been playing more since the preseason 8 patch dropped and have gotten up to level 35. However I have not received a level up capsule for level 34 or 35 and I'm extremely pissed. What's the point in putting time into the game if I can't even unlock the champions I want. Are the level up capsules supposed to only have a chance to drop, or am I simply just not receiving any?

replies.body: No worries! I was able to see that you never got those capsules from the recent levelups so I've got those added. If this ever happens again please hit us up in a ticket asap so we can get this fixed quickly and figure out what went wrong to begin with!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=g7aEEIyi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-27T01:50:46.953+0000)
>
> No worries! I was able to see that you never got those capsules from the recent levelups so I've got those added. If this ever happens again please hit us up in a ticket asap so we can get this fixed quickly and figure out what went wrong to begin with!

Still haven't received my capsule

Sorry we missed your comment down there, comments won't actually alert us to your response like a reply would. Overall, it's best to make your own post when you're having any type of issue to make sure it gets addressed!

Which level capsule did you think you were missing? So far it looks like you've gotten everything.
Thank you so much I really appreciate it
I have not gotten one yet i just leveled up from 30->31 and it says i received one but when i go to my loot its not there

another common recurring problem right now is that people who are leveled past 40 stop receiving rewards. riot hasn't given any explanation or announced they'd be fixing it. only thing to do here is wait.
